description.value:
This ash staff is decorated with animals; wielding it, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify conjuration magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Tanglefoot]{Tanglefoot}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Construct]{Summon Construct}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unseen Servant]{Unseen Servant}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Obscuring Mist]{Obscuring Mist}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Phantom Steed]{Phantom Steed}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Construct]{Summon Construct}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Elemental]{Summon Elemental}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Stinking Cloud]{Stinking Cloud}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Construct]{Summon Construct}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Elemental]{Summon Elemental}
  • 4th , @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Creation]{Creation}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Phantom Steed]{Phantom Steed}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Construct]{Summon Construct}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Elemental]{Summon Elemental}
  • 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Black Tentacles]{Black Tentacles}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Construct]{Summon Construct}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Elemental]{Summon Elemental}
  • 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Phantom Steed]{Phantom Steed}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Construct]{Summon Construct}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Elemental]{Summon Elemental}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
